mapper.select: select c.id,cb.brandname,c.carname,ct.cartype,c.carlnwhere,c.carlntime,cbt.carbirth,cdt.caredition,cm.carmileage,c.cardisplacement,c.carmotor,c.cardrive,c.caroil,c.carlong,c.carwide,c.carheight,cll.levelname,c.cartrunk,dt.drivetype,c.carprice,c.carno,cc.carcolor,cp.carpower,cpp.carpop,cpm.carpmethod,c.caricon,cvl.carvalidate,c.carhavename from car c,carbrands cb,carbirth cbt,caredition cdt,carlevels cll,carmileage cm,cartype ct,carcolor cc,carpower cp,carpop cpp,carpmethod cpm,carvalidate cvl,drivetype dt where c.cartypeID=ct.cartypeid and c.carmileageid=cm.carmileageid and c.carbrandid=cb.carbrandid and c.carlevelid=cll.levelid and c.carbirthid=cbt.carbirthid and c.caredition=cdt.careditionid and c.carcolorid=cc.carcolorid and c.carpowerid=cp.carpowerid and c.carpopid=cpp.carpopid and c.carpmethodid=cpm.carpmethodid and c.carvalidateid=cvl.carvalidateid and c.drivetypeid=dt.drivetypeid

select c.id,cb.brandname,c.carname,ct.cartype,c.carlnwhere,c.carlntime,cbt.carbirth,cdt.caredition,cm.carmileage,c.cardisplacement,c.carmotor,c.cardrive,c.caroil,c.carlong,c.carwide,c.carheight,cll.levelname,c.cartrunk,dt.drivetype,c.carprice,c.carno,cc.carcolor,cp.carpower,cpp.carpop,cpm.carpmethod,c.caricon,cvl.carvalidate,c.carhavename from car c,carbrands cb,carbirth cbt,caredition cdt,carlevels cll,carmileage cm,cartype ct,carcolor cc,carpower cp,carpop cpp,carpmethod cpm,carvalidate cvl,drivetype dt where c.cartypeID=ct.cartypeid and c.carmileageid=cm.carmileageid and c.carbrandid=cb.carbrandid and c.carlevelid=cll.levelid and c.carbirthid=cbt.carbirthid and c.caredition=cdt.careditionid and c.carcolorid=cc.carcolorid and c.carpowerid=cp.carpowerid and c.carpopid=cpp.carpopid and c.carpmethodid=cpm.carpmethodid and c.carvalidateid=cvl.carvalidateid and c.drivetypeid=dt.drivetypeid and cb.brandname=#{brandname}

select c.id,cb.brandname,c.carname,ct.cartype,c.carlnwhere,c.carlntime,cbt.carbirth,cdt.caredition,cm.carmileage,c.cardisplacement,c.carmotor,c.cardrive,c.caroil,c.carlong,c.carwide,c.carheight,cll.levelname,c.cartrunk,dt.drivetype,c.carprice,c.carno,cc.carcolor,cp.carpower,cpp.carpop,cpm.carpmethod,c.caricon,cvl.carvalidate,c.carhavename from car c,carbrands cb,carbirth cbt,caredition cdt,carlevels cll,carmileage cm,cartype ct,carcolor cc,carpower cp,carpop cpp,carpmethod cpm,carvalidate cvl,drivetype dt where c.cartypeID=ct.cartypeid and c.carmileageid=cm.carmileageid and c.carbrandid=cb.carbrandid and c.carlevelid=cll.levelid and c.carbirthid=cbt.carbirthid and c.caredition=cdt.careditionid and c.carcolorid=cc.carcolorid and c.carpowerid=cp.carpowerid and c.carpopid=cpp.carpopid and c.carpmethodid=cpm.carpmethodid and c.carvalidateid=cvl.carvalidateid and c.drivetypeid=dt.drivetypeid and c.carvalidateid=1 and c.carsell='否'

select c.id,cb.brandname,c.carname,ct.cartype,c.carlnwhere,c.carlntime,cbt.carbirth,cdt.caredition,cm.carmileage,c.cardisplacement,c.carmotor,c.cardrive,c.caroil,c.carlong,c.carwide,c.carheight,cll.levelname,c.cartrunk,dt.drivetype,c.carprice,c.carno,cc.carcolor,cp.carpower,cpp.carpop,cpm.carpmethod,c.caricon,cvl.carvalidate,c.carhavename from car c,carbrands cb,carbirth cbt,caredition cdt,carlevels cll,carmileage cm,cartype ct,carcolor cc,carpower cp,carpop cpp,carpmethod cpm,carvalidate cvl,drivetype dt where c.cartypeID=ct.cartypeid and c.carmileageid=cm.carmileageid and c.carbrandid=cb.carbrandid and c.carlevelid=cll.levelid and c.carbirthid=cbt.carbirthid and c.caredition=cdt.careditionid and c.carcolorid=cc.carcolorid and c.carpowerid=cp.carpowerid and c.carpopid=cpp.carpopid and c.carpmethodid=cpm.carpmethodid and c.carvalidateid=cvl.carvalidateid and c.drivetypeid=dt.drivetypeid and c.carvalidateid=2 and c.carallocation='否' and c.carsell='否'

select c.id,cb.brandname,c.carname,ct.cartype,c.carlnwhere,c.carlntime,cbt.carbirth,cdt.caredition,cm.carmileage,c.cardisplacement,c.carmotor,c.cardrive,c.caroil,c.carlong,c.carwide,c.carheight,cll.levelname,c.cartrunk,dt.drivetype,c.carprice,c.carno,cc.carcolor,cp.carpower,cpp.carpop,cpm.carpmethod,c.caricon,cvl.carvalidate,c.carhavename from car c,carbrands cb,carbirth cbt,caredition cdt,carlevels cll,carmileage cm,cartype ct,carcolor cc,carpower cp,carpop cpp,carpmethod cpm,carvalidate cvl,drivetype dt where c.cartypeID=ct.cartypeid and c.carmileageid=cm.carmileageid and c.carbrandid=cb.carbrandid and c.carlevelid=cll.levelid and c.carbirthid=cbt.carbirthid and c.caredition=cdt.careditionid and c.carcolorid=cc.carcolorid and c.carpowerid=cp.carpowerid and c.carpopid=cpp.carpopid and c.carpmethodid=cpm.carpmethodid and c.carvalidateid=cvl.carvalidateid and c.drivetypeid=dt.drivetypeid and c.carvalidateid=2 and c.carsell='否'

select c.id,cb.brandname,c.carname,ct.cartype,c.carlnwhere,c.carlntime,cbt.carbirth,cdt.caredition,cm.carmileage,c.cardisplacement,c.carmotor,c.cardrive,c.caroil,c.carlong,c.carwide,c.carheight,cll.levelname,c.cartrunk,dt.drivetype,c.carprice,c.carno,cc.carcolor,cp.carpower,cpp.carpop,cpm.carpmethod,c.caricon,cvl.carvalidate,c.carhavename,c.carmileages,c.cariconone,c.caricontwo,c.cariconthree,c.cariconfour,c.cariconfive from car c,carbrands cb,carbirth cbt,caredition cdt,carlevels cll,carmileage cm,cartype ct,carcolor cc,carpower cp,carpop cpp,carpmethod cpm,carvalidate cvl,drivetype dt where c.cartypeID=ct.cartypeid and c.carmileageid=cm.carmileageid and c.carbrandid=cb.carbrandid and c.carlevelid=cll.levelid and c.carbirthid=cbt.carbirthid and c.caredition=cdt.careditionid and c.carcolorid=cc.carcolorid and c.carpowerid=cp.carpowerid and c.carpopid=cpp.carpopid and c.carpmethodid=cpm.carpmethodid and c.carvalidateid=cvl.carvalidateid and c.drivetypeid=dt.drivetypeid and c.id=#{id}

select c.id,cb.brandname,c.carname,ct.cartype,c.carlnwhere,c.carlntime,cbt.carbirth,cdt.caredition,cm.carmileage,c.cardisplacement,c.carmotor,c.cardrive,c.caroil,c.carlong,c.carwide,c.carheight,cll.levelname,c.cartrunk,dt.drivetype,c.carprice,c.carno,cc.carcolor,cp.carpower,cpp.carpop,cpm.carpmethod,c.caricon,cvl.carvalidate,c.carhavename from car c,carbrands cb,carbirth cbt,caredition cdt,carlevels cll,carmileage cm,cartype ct,carcolor cc,carpower cp,carpop cpp,carpmethod cpm,carvalidate cvl,drivetype dt where c.cartypeID=ct.cartypeid and c.carmileageid=cm.carmileageid and c.carbrandid=cb.carbrandid and c.carlevelid=cll.levelid and c.carbirthid=cbt.carbirthid and c.caredition=cdt.careditionid and c.carcolorid=cc.carcolorid and c.carpowerid=cp.carpowerid and c.carpopid=cpp.carpopid and c.carpmethodid=cpm.carpmethodid and c.carvalidateid=cvl.carvalidateid and c.drivetypeid=dt.drivetypeid and cb.brandname like "%"#{brandname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%" and c.carvalidateid=1 and c.carsell='否'

select c.id,cb.brandname,c.carname,ct.cartype,c.carlnwhere,c.carlntime,cbt.carbirth,cdt.caredition,cm.carmileage,c.cardisplacement,c.carmotor,c.cardrive,c.caroil,c.carlong,c.carwide,c.carheight,cll.levelname,c.cartrunk,dt.drivetype,c.carprice,c.carno,cc.carcolor,cp.carpower,cpp.carpop,cpm.carpmethod,c.caricon,cvl.carvalidate,c.carhavename from car c,carbrands cb,carbirth cbt,caredition cdt,carlevels cll,carmileage cm,cartype ct,carcolor cc,carpower cp,carpop cpp,carpmethod cpm,carvalidate cvl,drivetype dt where c.cartypeID=ct.cartypeid and c.carmileageid=cm.carmileageid and c.carbrandid=cb.carbrandid and c.carlevelid=cll.levelid and c.carbirthid=cbt.carbirthid and c.caredition=cdt.careditionid and c.carcolorid=cc.carcolorid and c.carpowerid=cp.carpowerid and c.carpopid=cpp.carpopid and c.carpmethodid=cpm.carpmethodid and c.carvalidateid=cvl.carvalidateid and c.drivetypeid=dt.drivetypeid and #{arg0} <= c.carprice and #{arg1} >= c.carprice and c.carvalidateid=1 and c.carsell='否'

select c.id,cb.brandname,c.carname,ct.cartype,c.carlnwhere,c.carlntime,cbt.carbirth,cdt.caredition,cm.carmileage,c.cardisplacement,c.carmotor,c.cardrive,c.caroil,c.carlong,c.carwide,c.carheight,cll.levelname,c.cartrunk,dt.drivetype,c.carprice,c.carno,cc.carcolor,cp.carpower,cpp.carpop,cpm.carpmethod,c.caricon,cvl.carvalidate,c.carhavename,c.carheat from car c,carbrands cb,carbirth cbt,caredition cdt,carlevels cll,carmileage cm,cartype ct,carcolor cc,carpower cp,carpop cpp,carpmethod cpm,carvalidate cvl,drivetype dt where c.cartypeID=ct.cartypeid and c.carmileageid=cm.carmileageid and c.carbrandid=cb.carbrandid and c.carlevelid=cll.levelid and c.carbirthid=cbt.carbirthid and c.caredition=cdt.careditionid and c.carcolorid=cc.carcolorid and c.carpowerid=cp.carpowerid and c.carpopid=cpp.carpopid and c.carpmethodid=cpm.carpmethodid and c.carvalidateid=cvl.carvalidateid and c.drivetypeid=dt.drivetypeid and c.carvalidateid=1 and c.carsell='否' and #{arg0} <= c.carprice and #{arg1} >= c.carprice order by c.carheat desc limit 0,4

select c.id,cb.brandname,c.carname,ct.cartype,c.carlnwhere,c.carlntime,cbt.carbirth,cdt.caredition,cm.carmileage,c.cardisplacement,c.carmotor,c.cardrive,c.caroil,c.carlong,c.carwide,c.carheight,cll.levelname,c.cartrunk,dt.drivetype,c.carprice,c.carno,cc.carcolor,cp.carpower,cpp.carpop,cpm.carpmethod,c.caricon,cvl.carvalidate,c.carhavename,c.carheat from car c,carbrands cb,carbirth cbt,caredition cdt,carlevels cll,carmileage cm,cartype ct,carcolor cc,carpower cp,carpop cpp,carpmethod cpm,carvalidate cvl,drivetype dt where c.cartypeID=ct.cartypeid and c.carmileageid=cm.carmileageid and c.carbrandid=cb.carbrandid and c.carlevelid=cll.levelid and c.carbirthid=cbt.carbirthid and c.caredition=cdt.careditionid and c.carcolorid=cc.carcolorid and c.carpowerid=cp.carpowerid and c.carpopid=cpp.carpopid and c.carpmethodid=cpm.carpmethodid and c.carvalidateid=cvl.carvalidateid and c.drivetypeid=dt.drivetypeid and c.carsell='否' and c.carvalidateid=1 and (SELECT YEAR(CURRENT_DATE)-YEAR(c.carlntime)) < 2 order by c.carheat desc limit 0,4

SELECT c.id,cb.brandname,c.carname,ct.cartype,c.carlnwhere,c.carlntime,cbt.carbirth,cdt.caredition,cm.carmileage,c.cardisplacement,c.carmotor,c.cardrive,c.caroil,c.carlong,c.carwide,c.carheight,cll.levelname,c.cartrunk,dt.drivetype,c.carprice,c.carno,cc.carcolor,cp.carpower,cpp.carpop,cpm.carpmethod,c.caricon,cvl.carvalidate,c.carhavename,c.carheat FROM car c,carbrands cb,carbirth cbt,caredition cdt,carlevels cll,carmileage cm,cartype ct,carcolor cc,carpower cp,carpop cpp,carpmethod cpm,carvalidate cvl,drivetype dt WHERE c.cartypeID=ct.cartypeid AND c.carmileageid=cm.carmileageid AND c.carbrandid=cb.carbrandid AND c.carlevelid=cll.levelid AND c.carbirthid=cbt.carbirthid AND c.caredition=cdt.careditionid AND c.carcolorid=cc.carcolorid AND c.carpowerid=cp.carpowerid AND c.carpopid=cpp.carpopid AND c.carpmethodid=cpm.carpmethodid AND c.carvalidateid=cvl.carvalidateid AND c.drivetypeid=dt.drivetypeid and c.carvalidateid=1 AND cll.levelname='中型车' and c.carsell='否' ORDER BY c.carheat DESC LIMIT 0,4

select c.id,cb.brandname,c.carname,ct.cartype,c.carlnwhere,c.carlntime,cbt.carbirth,cdt.caredition,cm.carmileage,c.cardisplacement,c.carmotor,c.cardrive,c.caroil,c.carlong,c.carwide,c.carheight,cll.levelname,c.cartrunk,dt.drivetype,c.carprice,c.carno,cc.carcolor,cp.carpower,cpp.carpop,cpm.carpmethod,c.caricon,cvl.carvalidate,c.carhavename from car c,carbrands cb,carbirth cbt,caredition cdt,carlevels cll,carmileage cm,cartype ct,carcolor cc,carpower cp,carpop cpp,carpmethod cpm,carvalidate cvl,drivetype dt where c.cartypeID=ct.cartypeid and c.carmileageid=cm.carmileageid and c.carbrandid=cb.carbrandid and c.carlevelid=cll.levelid and c.carbirthid=cbt.carbirthid and c.caredition=cdt.careditionid and c.carcolorid=cc.carcolorid and c.carpowerid=cp.carpowerid and c.carpopid=cpp.carpopid and c.carpmethodid=cpm.carpmethodid and c.carvalidateid=cvl.carvalidateid and c.drivetypeid=dt.drivetypeid and c.carvalidateid=1 and cll.levelname=#{levelname} and c.carsell='否'

select c.id,cb.brandname,c.carname,ct.cartype,c.carlnwhere,c.carlntime,cbt.carbirth,cdt.caredition,cm.carmileage,c.cardisplacement,c.carmotor,c.cardrive,c.caroil,c.carlong,c.carwide,c.carheight,cll.levelname,c.cartrunk,dt.drivetype,c.carprice,c.carno,cc.carcolor,cp.carpower,cpp.carpop,cpm.carpmethod,c.caricon,cvl.carvalidate,c.carhavename from car c,carbrands cb,carbirth cbt,caredition cdt,carlevels cll,carmileage cm,cartype ct,carcolor cc,carpower cp,carpop cpp,carpmethod cpm,carvalidate cvl,drivetype dt where c.cartypeID=ct.cartypeid and c.carmileageid=cm.carmileageid and c.carbrandid=cb.carbrandid and c.carlevelid=cll.levelid and c.carbirthid=cbt.carbirthid and c.caredition=cdt.careditionid and c.carcolorid=cc.carcolorid and c.carpowerid=cp.carpowerid and c.carpopid=cpp.carpopid and c.carpmethodid=cpm.carpmethodid and c.carvalidateid=cvl.carvalidateid and c.drivetypeid=dt.drivetypeid and c.carvalidateid=1 and cm.carmileage=#{carmileage} and c.carsell='否'

select c.id,cb.brandname,c.carname,ct.cartype,c.carlnwhere,c.carlntime,cbt.carbirth,cdt.caredition,cm.carmileage,c.cardisplacement,c.carmotor,c.cardrive,c.caroil,c.carlong,c.carwide,c.carheight,cll.levelname,c.cartrunk,dt.drivetype,c.carprice,c.carno,cc.carcolor,cp.carpower,cpp.carpop,cpm.carpmethod,c.caricon,cvl.carvalidate,c.carhavename from car c,carbrands cb,carbirth cbt,caredition cdt,carlevels cll,carmileage cm,cartype ct,carcolor cc,carpower cp,carpop cpp,carpmethod cpm,carvalidate cvl,drivetype dt where c.cartypeID=ct.cartypeid and c.carmileageid=cm.carmileageid and c.carbrandid=cb.carbrandid and c.carlevelid=cll.levelid and c.carbirthid=cbt.carbirthid and c.caredition=cdt.careditionid and c.carcolorid=cc.carcolorid and c.carpowerid=cp.carpowerid and c.carpopid=cpp.carpopid and c.carpmethodid=cpm.carpmethodid and c.carvalidateid=cvl.carvalidateid and c.drivetypeid=dt.drivetypeid and c.carvalidateid=1 and cc.carcolor=#{carcolor} and c.carsell='否'

select c.id,cb.brandname,c.carname,ct.cartype,c.carlnwhere,c.carlntime,cbt.carbirth,cdt.caredition,cm.carmileage,c.cardisplacement,c.carmotor,c.cardrive,c.caroil,c.carlong,c.carwide,c.carheight,cll.levelname,c.cartrunk,dt.drivetype,c.carprice,c.carno,cc.carcolor,cp.carpower,cpp.carpop,cpm.carpmethod,c.caricon,cvl.carvalidate,c.carhavename from car c,carbrands cb,carbirth cbt,caredition cdt,carlevels cll,carmileage cm,cartype ct,carcolor cc,carpower cp,carpop cpp,carpmethod cpm,carvalidate cvl,drivetype dt where c.cartypeID=ct.cartypeid and c.carmileageid=cm.carmileageid and c.carbrandid=cb.carbrandid and c.carlevelid=cll.levelid and c.carbirthid=cbt.carbirthid and c.caredition=cdt.careditionid and c.carcolorid=cc.carcolorid and c.carpowerid=cp.carpowerid and c.carpopid=cpp.carpopid and c.carpmethodid=cpm.carpmethodid and c.carvalidateid=cvl.carvalidateid and c.drivetypeid=dt.drivetypeid and c.carvalidateid=1 and cpp.carpop=#{carpop} and c.carsell='否'

select c.id,cb.brandname,c.carname,ct.cartype,c.carlnwhere,c.carlntime,cbt.carbirth,cdt.caredition,cm.carmileage,c.cardisplacement,c.carmotor,c.cardrive,c.caroil,c.carlong,c.carwide,c.carheight,cll.levelname,c.cartrunk,dt.drivetype,c.carprice,c.carno,cc.carcolor,cp.carpower,cpp.carpop,cpm.carpmethod,c.caricon,cvl.carvalidate,c.carhavename from car c,carbrands cb,carbirth cbt,caredition cdt,carlevels cll,carmileage cm,cartype ct,carcolor cc,carpower cp,carpop cpp,carpmethod cpm,carvalidate cvl,drivetype dt where c.cartypeID=ct.cartypeid and c.carmileageid=cm.carmileageid and c.carbrandid=cb.carbrandid and c.carlevelid=cll.levelid and c.carbirthid=cbt.carbirthid and c.caredition=cdt.careditionid and c.carcolorid=cc.carcolorid and c.carpowerid=cp.carpowerid and c.carpopid=cpp.carpopid and c.carpmethodid=cpm.carpmethodid and c.carvalidateid=cvl.carvalidateid and c.drivetypeid=dt.drivetypeid and c.carvalidateid=1 and cp.carpower=#{carpower} and c.carsell='否'

select c.id,cb.brandname,c.carname,ct.cartype,c.carlnwhere,c.carlntime,cbt.carbirth,cdt.caredition,cm.carmileage,c.cardisplacement,c.carmotor,c.cardrive,c.caroil,c.carlong,c.carwide,c.carheight,cll.levelname,c.cartrunk,dt.drivetype,c.carprice,c.carno,cc.carcolor,cp.carpower,cpp.carpop,cpm.carpmethod,c.caricon,cvl.carvalidate,c.carhavename from car c,carbrands cb,carbirth cbt,caredition cdt,carlevels cll,carmileage cm,cartype ct,carcolor cc,carpower cp,carpop cpp,carpmethod cpm,carvalidate cvl,drivetype dt where c.cartypeID=ct.cartypeid and c.carmileageid=cm.carmileageid and c.carbrandid=cb.carbrandid and c.carlevelid=cll.levelid and c.carbirthid=cbt.carbirthid and c.caredition=cdt.careditionid and c.carcolorid=cc.carcolorid and c.carpowerid=cp.carpowerid and c.carpopid=cpp.carpopid and c.carpmethodid=cpm.carpmethodid and c.carvalidateid=cvl.carvalidateid and c.drivetypeid=dt.drivetypeid and c.carvalidateid=1 and cpm.carpmethod=#{carpmethod} and c.carsell='否'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO car(carbrandid,carname,cartypeID,carlnwhere,carlntime,carbirthid,caredition,carmileageid,cardisplacement,carmotor,cardrive,caroil,carlevelid,drivetypeid,carprice,carno,carcolorid,carpowerid,carpopid,carpmethodid,carvalidateid,carheat,carsell,carallocation) VALUES((SELECT carbrandid FROM carbrands WHERE brandname=#{brandname}),#{carname},(select cartypeid from cartype where cartype=#{cartype}),#{carlnwhere},#{carlntime},(select carbirthid from carbirth where carbirth=#{carbirth}),(select careditionid from caredition where caredition=#{caredition}),(select carmileageid from carmileage where carmileage=#{carmileage}),#{cardisplacement},#{carmotor},#{cardrive},#{caroil},(select levelid from carlevels where levelname=#{levelname}),(select drivetypeid from drivetype where drivetype=#{drivetype}),#{carprice},#{carno},(select carcolorid from carcolor where carcolor=#{carcolor}),(select carpowerid from carpower where carpower=#{carpower}),(select carpopid from carpop where carpop=#{carpop}),(select carpmethodid from carpmethod where carpmethod=#{carpmethod}),carvalidateid=2,0,'否','否')
mapper.update: update car set carheat=#{carheat} where id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into sellcar(carid,userinfoid) values((select id from car where carno=#{arg0}),(select id from userinfo where username=#{arg1}))
mapper.update: update car set carsell='是' where id=#{id}
